body: i'm thankful that though i got food poisoning last night from i think domino's "buffalo wings" and spent most of the evening throwing up into our toilets, i eventually stopped throwing up. i'm thankful that i woke up in the middle of the night, probably because i passed out so early, which normally would have annoyed me, but i'm thankful i was so happy not to be throwing up or feeling like i needed to throw up anymore that i was still really happy to just lay there awake and didn't care that i wasn't sleeping. i'm thankful that this has been the first time i've really thrown up in several years and i'm thankful to hope that the next time will not be for several more years.
